# LLM_BOOK Visuals

**Purpose:** Generated diagrams and visual content from NotebookLM

---

## Generated Diagrams

### FRAMEWORK.png (6MB)

**Description:** Visual representation of the Nyquist Consciousness framework architecture

**Generated by:** NotebookLM Mind Map feature
**Date:** ~December 2025
**Customization:** Default settings

**Contains:**
- S-Stack architecture (S0-SΩ)
- Key concept relationships
- Framework overview

**Use Cases:**
- WHITE-PAPER/figures/
- Presentations
- Popular science articles
- Educational materials

---

### NotebookLM_Mind_Map.png (5.5MB)

**Description:** Mind map showing relationships between concepts in the Nyquist Consciousness framework

**Generated by:** NotebookLM Mind Map feature
**Date:** ~December 2025
**Customization:** Default settings

**Contains:**
- Concept interconnections
- Topic hierarchies
- Research area mapping

**Use Cases:**
- Research orientation
- New collaborator onboarding
- Scope visualization

---

## Usage Notes

### File Sizes
Both files are large (5-6MB). For web use, consider:
- Creating optimized versions (PNG → compressed PNG or WebP)
- Extracting specific sections
- Reducing resolution for previews

### Copyright
Generated by NotebookLM from our source materials. Attribution:
> Visual generated by Google NotebookLM from Nyquist Consciousness Framework research materials.
